metadata.title: CVE-2016-8411 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability while processing QMI QOS TLVs. Product:Android. Versions: versions that have qmi_qos_srvc.c. Android ID: 31805216.References: QC CR#912775.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
